trans-unit.source: Explore data in the Cortana Analytics Process | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Explore data in the Cortana Analytics Process | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to explore data in various storage enviromnents.
trans-unit.target: How to explore data in various storage enviromnents.

trans-unit.source: Explore data in the Cortana Analytics Process
trans-unit.target: Explore data in the Cortana Analytics Process

trans-unit.source: This document covers how to explore data in four different environments typically used in the Cortana Analytics Process:
trans-unit.target: This document covers how to explore data in four different environments typically used in the Cortana Analytics Process:

trans-unit.source: **Azure blob container** data is explored using the [Pandas](http://pandas.pydata.org/) Python package.
trans-unit.target: **Azure blob container** data is explored using the [Pandas](http://pandas.pydata.org/) Python package.

trans-unit.source: **SQL Server data** data is explored by using SQL and by using a programming language like Python.
trans-unit.target: **SQL Server data** data is explored by using SQL and by using a programming language like Python.

trans-unit.source: **Hive table** data is explored using Hive queries.
trans-unit.target: **Hive table** data is explored using Hive queries.

trans-unit.source: **Azure Machine Learning (AML) Studio** data is explored using AML modules.
trans-unit.target: **Azure Machine Learning (AML) Studio** data is explored using AML modules.

trans-unit.source: This **menu** links to the topics that describe how to use these tools to explore data from various storage environments.
trans-unit.target: This **menu** links to the topics that describe how to use these tools to explore data from various storage environments.
